conversations.description: Researcher uploads a lung cancer trial protocol and the LLM parses the eligibility text into JSON.
Investigator requests the LLM to find breast cancer patients aged 40‑65 with HER2‑positive status.
Coordinator asks the system to send a secure portal invitation to a matched patient with trial details.
Patient replies via portal, and the LLM records consent to be contacted for the trial.
Coordinator schedules a video consultation between the patient and the study nurse after consent.
Research team queries for patients with a specific genetic mutation (BRCA1) for an early‑phase study.
LLM parses a complex inclusion/exclusion clause about prior chemotherapy cycles into structured criteria.
System generates an audit log entry after sending a trial recruitment message to a patient.
Investigator asks for a list of eligible pediatric patients with Duchenne muscular dystrophy.
LLM identifies that a patient does not meet the ecog_max requirement and excludes them automatically.
Coordinator requests the system to resend a trial flyer to patients who did not open the first message.
Researcher wants to compare eligibility criteria across three similar multiple‑myeloma trials.
LLM extracts age_min and age_max from a free‑text eligibility paragraph for a cardiovascular study.
System queries EMR for patients on a prohibited medication and filters them out of the candidate list.
Coordinator asks the LLM to draft a personalized message referencing the patient’s recent lab results.
Patient declines participation, and the LLM logs the decline with timestamp for compliance.
Investigator requests a summary of how many eligible patients were identified per clinic site.
LLM parses exclusion criteria about pregnancy status and flags female patients of child‑bearing age.
Coordinator schedules a phone call for a patient who prefers telephonic discussion over video.
Researcher asks the system to re‑run eligibility matching after a protocol amendment expands age range.
LLM generates a markdown‑formatted trial overview to attach to the secure portal message.
System returns a concise list of patient IDs, ages, and diagnoses for a rare disease trial.
Coordinator requests the LLM to prioritize patients based on proximity to the trial site.
Patient asks for more information about trial risks; LLM replies with a balanced risk/benefit summary.
Investigator queries for patients who have completed a specific prior treatment within the last 6 months.
LLM identifies a duplicate patient record and consolidates the eligibility results.
Coordinator asks to draft a follow‑up reminder for patients who have not responded within 7 days.
Researcher uploads a multi‑arm trial protocol; LLM creates separate eligibility schemas for each arm.
System logs consent capture with a digital signature image attached to the audit record.
LLM extracts the ‘diagnosis’ field from a free‑text criterion describing stage III melanoma.
Coordinator requests a meeting link for a group orientation session with several matched patients.
Patient asks to withdraw consent; the LLM updates the consent record and notifies the study team.
Investigator wants to see the number of eligible patients per insurance carrier for budgeting.
LLM parses exclusion language about recent participation in another interventional study.
System returns an error when EMR query exceeds the limit; LLM suggests lowering the limit.
Coordinator asks the LLM to translate trial summary into layperson language for patient messaging.
Researcher wants to export the eligibility JSON schema to an external trial management system.
LLM flags a patient whose lab values are borderline and suggests manual review before outreach.
Patient confirms consent; the LLM automatically schedules the first screening appointment.
Investigator queries for patients with a specific comorbidity that is an exclusion factor.
LLM generates a subject line that includes the trial acronym and the patient’s disease.
Coordinator requests a summary of all consent timestamps for a regulatory audit.
System sends a secure message with attached PDF consent form for electronic signature.
LLM parses a criterion about “no prior organ transplantation” and maps it to a structured flag.
Researcher asks the LLM to identify gaps in eligibility criteria where data are missing in EMR.
Coordinator schedules a virtual meeting at a time that avoids the patient’s dialysis schedule.
Patient asks whether travel reimbursement is available; LLM provides a concise answer.
LLM aggregates demographic statistics (age, gender) for the pool of eligible patients.
Investigator requests to narrow the search to patients with a specific lab range (e.g., creatinine <1.2).
System logs the delivery receipt of a secure portal message and flags if the patient has not opened it.
LLM converts a PDF eligibility table into the JSON schema required for downstream tools.
Coordinator asks to resend consent forms to patients who previously declined but now want more info.
Researcher wants to see a timeline of when each eligible patient was first identified.
LLM interprets exclusion criteria about “active infection” and cross‑checks recent infection diagnoses.
Patient asks for a summary of the trial’s primary endpoint; LLM provides a lay‑friendly explanation.
